    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Production of sticky ends using restriction enzymes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Produktion der klebrigen Enden mit Beschränkung 
Enzymen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Production des extrémités collantes en 
utilisant des enzymes de restriction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Produção de extremidades pegajosas usando 
enzymes da limitação</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Produzione delle estremità appiccicose usando gli
enzimi di limitazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παραγωγή των κολλωδών ακρών που χρησιμοποιούν τα 
ένζυμα περιορισμού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Producción de extremos pegajosos usando las 
enzimas de la restricción</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows how a sticky end is created from a circular strand of DNA by the restriction enzyme EcoRI. This sticky end can bond with another complementary strand of DNA to make a recombinant DNA.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">circular strand</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">complementary sticky ends</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">DNA</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">EcoRI</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">genetic engineering</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">linear strand</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">recombinant DNA</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">restriction enzyme</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sticky end</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">target site</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">unpaired bases</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie ein klebriges Ende von 
einer kreisförmigen Faser von DNA durch das Beschränkung Enzym EcoRI
erstellt wird. Dieses klebrige Ende kann mit einer anderen 
ergänzenden Faser von DNA abbinden, um eine recombinant DNA zu 
bilden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre comment une extrémité
collante est créée d'un brin circulaire de l'ADN par l'enzyme EcoRI 
de restriction. Cette obligation collante de bidon 
d'extrémité avec un autre brin complémentaire de l'ADN pour 
préparer une ADN de recombinaison.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra como uma extremidade 
pegajosa é criada de uma costa circular do DNA pelo enzyme EcoRI da 
limitação. Esta extremidade pegajosa pode ligar-se com uma 
outra costa complementar do DNA para fazer um DNA recombinant.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra come un'estremità 
appiccicosa è creata da un filo circolare di DNA dall'enzima EcoRI di
limitazione. Questa estremità appiccicosa può legare con un 
altro filo complementare di DNA per preparare un DNA recombinant.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση επιδεικνύει πώς ένα κολλώδες 
τέλος δημιουργείται από ένα κυκλικό σκέλος του DNA από το 
ένζυμο EcoRI περιορισμού. Αυτό το κολλώδες τέλος μπορεί
να συνδέσει με ένα άλλο συμπληρωματικό σκέλος του DNA για να 
κάνει ένα ανασυνδυαζόμενο DNA.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra cómo un extremo 
pegajoso es creado de un hilo circular de la DNA por la enzima EcoRI 
de la restricción. Este extremo pegajoso puede pegar con otro 
hilo complementario de la DNA para hacer una DNA recombinant.</string>
          </description>
